CustomField.description:
All current seats rolling up to this BU. Updated via the Rollup Helper for Rollup Qualified Opportunities. This field will roll up to the corresponding Account field.
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/New-Salesforce-Fields-Opportunities-Business-Units-Accounts--Ay1q1~SCRlqq2EmE9wVHvqBrAQ-PkyPecvObh7GLmPeED6TB
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/How-to-Use-the-Opportunity-Fields-April-2020--Ay52tLsUoyROBPXqkP99eIafAQ-Wy8AxHfGwiplwNW20Jhl3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of the Seats Sold field on the Opportunity chain. This is equivalent to the total billed seats for this Business Unit (not MAUs).
CustomField.label: Total Users (Standard)
